content: the salish sea short beanie pattern is available for free on my website 1 this beanie was inspired by a visitor to one of my christmas craft fairs last year she asked me for a short style beanie i tried about four different prototypes before finally deciding on this version of a short beanie i love the top down construction style and the ribbed brim it folds up and the beanie sits so nicely on the head it can also be worn set back on the head the salish sea short beanie is versatile and can be worn with the brim folded down so it transforms into a regular style beanie 1 https //carrowaycrochet com/the-salish-sea-short-beanie-free-crochet-pattern/
